---
title: Pivot Shift Test
subtitle: Provacative Test for ACL Dysfunction
---

# Technique

- 1 hand on proximal tibia
- other hand above the knee
- Valgus + IR
- Move from full knee extension to flexion

# Grading

- Pain?
- Subluxation at 30-40&deg; flexion from full extension

# Psychometrics

:::{.callout-caution}
Here are some broad psychometrics, but I need to find better studies for this

- Spec 98%
- sens 30%
:::
